name: Xeno Panic
description:
Have you ever been spooked from watching sci-fi horror movies? 
Wouldn't you be extremely cautious and scared if you were to walk through the abandoned spaceship invaded by aliens?

Xeno Panic is a sci-fi puzzle game where you control an overly anxious traveler to help him collect keys to unlock doors to escape from the aliens successfully. Be careful how you navigate the traveler as you can lose the control the traveler when he's scared!
*You will see a bar filling up, indicating the traveler's fear level that can lead him to run away once it fills up red.  


W/A/S/D : Player & Camera Movement 

Left Mouse Button : Interaction with Objects & Regain Control 

F5 : Return to the Main Menu

ESC (Escape) : Close the Game 

Download XenoPanic.zip and use any extractor tool to unzip the folder. Open Space_Jam.exe to play the game.

Designed and Developed by
Brandon Budidjaja
David Luna
Henri Scharr
Kun He
Yoon Ha Baek

Audio by
Shauing
